item.title: U.S. stocks drop as Nvidia slides and the fog of Trump's trade war thickens
item.description: The S&P 500 sank 2.2% after falling as much as 3.3% earlier. Such an amount would have vied for one of its worst losses in years before the historic swings that have upended Wall Street in recent weeks.
